item.description:
PLANNING COMMITTEE MEETING

In Fall of 2009, Revolve Nation, the largest and most premiere networking organization for entrepreneurs in Boston, will be hosting the 1st Annual Revolve Nation Entrepreneur of the Year Awards Ceremony! The Ceremony will recognize accomplishments and leadership in the national entrepreneurial community by honoring entrepreneurs is each of several categories selected by the Selection Committee. True to its name, this landmark event is organized by entrepreneurs for entrepreneurs.

ATTENDANCE: The Planning Committee Meeting is an Invitation Only Event

At this meeting the Executive Committee will present the event to interested Committee Members and interview them for a leadership position in the organization and planning for this landmark event.
If you believe you have the skills, dedication, and enthusiasm to be a part of planning this event, please contact Chris at cmarston@exemplarlaw.com for consideration of particiation!

Sponsored By: Revolve, Inc www.revolvethis.com
item.name: Planning Committee: Revolve Nation 1st Annual Entrepreneur of the Year Awards
